title: Array Multiplication
brief: Practice using loops to multiply all elements in an array together.

exercise.title: Multiplying Array Elements
exercise.instructions: Create a function that takes an array as input and returns the product of its elements. Use a for loop to iterate over the array and the multiplication operator (*).

steps.label: Iterate over the array using a for loop
Use the multiplication operator (*) to multiply elements together
Reduce the array to a single product

acceptance.prompt: Create a function that takes an array as input and returns the product of its elements. Use a for loop to iterate over the array and the multiplication operator (*).

auto.feedback: Correct! Your function uses a for loop and the multiplication operator to calculate the product of array elements.
